changelog.description: - Improve array mutation safety to prevent potential crashes when using Select/Deselect All - Unsafe ForEach pattern in ScanResultsCard that could cause index out of bounds - Force unwrap in FileScanner that could crash if categories array was empty - CGGradient force unwraps in SpaceLensView with fallback rendering - Unsafe direct array index access in PerformanceView
Hide toolbar background to prevent visible bar in DetailContentView
